description: Impress your friends and family with this fancy homemade French&nbsp;hot chocolate recipe. You can make a big batch of the base ahead of time, then just add milk for each guest who wants it!
name: French Hot Chocolate
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Heavy whipping cream whipped to stiff peaks
